song_lyrics: Enī jībhā par ratṇā Shrījīnī vasī,
Enā gnān sāthe bhaktinī mastī vasī... 2
Shrījī Bhagwān ne Guṇātīt bhakta chhe,
Samje ā jan e to māyāthī mukta chhe,
Enī bhaktimā shakti to āvī vasī... 4
title: Enī chāl chhe mastān enā hāthmā chhe māḷā

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-146: unknown

Category: Pramukh Swami Maharajna Pad
